price: Walipo tupa, Musa alisema: Mliyo leta ni uchawi. Hakika Mwenyezi Mungu haitengenezi kazi ya waharibifu.
arabic: فَلَمَّآ أَلۡقَوۡاْ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ مَا جِئۡتُم بِهِ ٱلسِّحۡرُۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَيُبۡطِلُهُۥٓ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُصۡلِحُ عَمَلَ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ
footnotes: Walipo tupa kamba zao na fimbo zao, Musa aliwaambia: Huo mlio fanya ni uchawi kweli, na Mwenyezi Mungu Subhanahu atauvunja kwa mkono wangu! Hakika Mwenyezi Mungu hawasahilishii mafisadi vitendo vyao vikawa vizuri na vyenye nafuu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: falammā alqaw qāla mūsā mā ji'tum bihi al-siḥ'ru inna al-laha sayub'ṭiluhu inna al-laha lā yuṣ'liḥu ʿamala al-muf'sidīna
